projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with React, Node.js, and Stripe integration
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, payment processing with Stripe, order tracking, and an admin dashboard. The application demonstrates full-stack development skills including database design, API development, and responsive frontend design.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Real-time collaborative task management with drag-and-drop functionality
projects.longDescription: A modern task management application inspired by tools like Trello and Asana. Built with React and Socket.io for real-time collaboration. Features include drag-and-drop task organization, team collaboration, file attachments, due dates, and progress tracking. The app showcases advanced React patterns, real-time data synchronization, and responsive design principles.

projects.title: Weather Analytics API
projects.description: RESTful API for weather data aggregation and analytics
projects.longDescription: A robust RESTful API that aggregates weather data from multiple sources and provides advanced analytics. Built with Node.js and Express, featuring comprehensive OpenAPI documentation, rate limiting, caching with Redis, and extensive testing. The API demonstrates best practices in backend development including error handling, logging, and security measures.

projects.title: Design System Library
projects.description: Comprehensive React component library with Storybook documentation
projects.longDescription: A complete design system and component library built for scalable web applications. Includes 50+ React components, design tokens, comprehensive Storybook documentation, and automated testing. The library demonstrates advanced component architecture, accessibility compliance, and design system best practices.

projects.title: Mobile Fitness Tracker
projects.description: React Native app for fitness tracking with health data integration
projects.longDescription: A cross-platform mobile application for fitness tracking built with React Native. Features include workout logging, progress tracking, health data integration, social sharing, and offline capability. The app showcases mobile development skills, state management with Redux, and integration with device APIs.

projects.title: Code Deployment Tool
projects.description: CLI tool for automated deployment and CI/CD pipeline management
projects.longDescription: A command-line tool built with Node.js for automating deployment processes and managing CI/CD pipelines. Features include Docker integration, AWS deployment, environment management, and comprehensive logging. The tool demonstrates DevOps skills, CLI development, and automation best practices.
